SELECT orbd1.id billDetailId, orc.main_order_no orderNo, pb.`name` bizCodeDesc, DATE_FORMAT( oi.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d' ) createdTimeStr, cus.`name` unitAccount, cg.`name` costGenreName, orc.cost_genre_id costGenreId, ct.code_name costTypeName, ci.`name` costName, orc.amount, orc.currency_code, orc.id costId, orc.is_bill isBill, ifnull(orc.change_amount,0) localAmount, orbd1.audit_status auditStatus FROM order_receivable_cost orc left join order_receivable_bill_detail orbd1 on orbd1.cost_id = orc.id left join customer_info cus on cus.id_code = orc.customer_code LEFT JOIN order_info oi ON orc.main_order_no = oi.order_no LEFT JOIN product_biz pb ON pb.id_code = oi.biz_code
LEFT JOIN cost_genre cg ON orc.cost_genre_id = cg.id LEFT JOIN cost_type ct ON orc.cost_type_id = ct.id LEFT JOIN cost_info ci ON orc.cost_code = ci.id_code
LEFT JOIN order_transport sub ON sub.main_order_no = oi.order_no LEFT JOIN order_send_cars osc ON sub.order_no = osc.order_no left join vehicle_info vi on vi.id = osc.vehicle_id left join order_customs oc on oc.order_no = opc.order_no
left join ${dynamicSqlParam.table} sub on sub.order_no = opc.order_no
-- LEFT JOIN order_transport ot ON ot.main_order_no = oi.order_no -- LEFT JOIN order_send_cars osc ON ot.order_no = osc.order_no -- left join vehicle_info vi on vi.id = osc.vehicle_id -- left join order_customs oc on oc.order_no = orc.order_no -- left join air_order ao on ao.order_no = orc.order_no -- left join sea_order so on so.order_no = orc.order_no -- left join order_inland_transport oit on oit.order_no = orc.order_no -- left join trailer_order tor on tor.order_no = orc.order_no INNER JOIN ( SELECT tmp.cost_id id FROM order_receivable_bill_detail tmp WHERE tmp.bill_no = #{form.billNo} UNION SELECT tmp1.id FROM order_receivable_cost tmp1 WHERE tmp1.is_bill = 'save_confirm' AND tmp1.tmp_bill_no = #{form.billNo} ) tmp3 ON tmp3.id = orc.id WHERE
oi.legal_name
orc.legal_name
sub.legal_name
= (select orb1.legal_name from order_receivable_bill orb1 left join order_receivable_bill_detail orbd1 on orb1.id = orbd1.bill_id where orbd1.bill_no = #{form.billNo} limit 1) and cus.`name` = (select orb1.unit_account from order_receivable_bill orb1 left join order_receivable_bill_detail orbd1 on orb1.id = orbd1.bill_id where orbd1.bill_no = #{form.billNo} limit 1)

SELECT CONCAT( orc.cost_code, orc.currency_code ) NAME, concat((select ci.name from cost_info ci where ci.id_code = orc.cost_code),'(',(select ci.currency_name from currency_info ci where ci. currency_code = orc.currency_code),')') viewName, sum( orc.amount ) FROM order_receivable_cost orc WHERE orc.id IN (select orbd.cost_id from order_receivable_bill_detail orbd where orbd.bill_no = #{billNo}) GROUP BY orc.cost_code, orc.currency_code
union
SELECT concat('T',orc.currency_code) NAME, concat('合计(',(select ci.currency_name from currency_info ci where ci. currency_code = orc.currency_code),')') viewName, sum( orc.amount ) FROM order_receivable_cost orc WHERE orc.id IN (select orbd.cost_id from order_receivable_bill_detail orbd where orbd.bill_no = #{billNo}) GROUP BY orc.currency_code

SELECT CONCAT( orc.cost_code, orc.currency_code ) NAME, orc.main_order_no orderNo, orc.order_no subOrderNo, concat((SELECT ci.NAME FROM cost_info ci WHERE ci.id_code = orc.cost_code ),'(',(SELECT ci.currency_name FROM currency_info ci WHERE ci.currency_code = orc.currency_code ),')' ) viewName, sum( orc.amount ) money FROM order_receivable_cost orc WHERE orc.id IN (select orbd.cost_id from order_receivable_bill_detail orbd where orbd.bill_no = #{billNo}) GROUP BY orc.cost_code, orc.currency_code, orc.main_order_no, orc.order_no union SELECT concat('T',orc.currency_code) NAME, orc.main_order_no orderNo, orc.order_no subOrderNo, concat('合计(',(SELECT ci.currency_name FROM currency_info ci WHERE ci.currency_code = orc.currency_code ),')' ) viewName, sum( orc.amount ) money FROM order_receivable_cost orc WHERE orc.id IN (select orbd.cost_id from order_receivable_bill_detail orbd where orbd.bill_no = #{billNo}) GROUP BY orc.currency_code, orc.main_order_no, orc.order_no

SELECT DATE_FORMAT( oi.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d' ) createdTimeStr, oi.order_no orderNo, orbd.bill_no billNo, (select orc.order_no from order_receivable_cost orc where orc.id = orbd.cost_id) subOrderNo, orb.unit_account unitAccount, ( SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(ota.goods_desc) FROM order_take_adr ota LEFT JOIN order_transport ot on ota.order_no = ot.order_no where ot.main_order_no = oi.order_no and ota.opr_type = '1' GROUP BY ot.order_no) goodsDesc, ( SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(concat(ifnull(da.city_name,''), da.address)) FROM delivery_address da LEFT JOIN order_take_adr ota on da.id = ota.delivery_id LEFT JOIN order_transport ot on ota.order_no = ot.order_no where ot.main_order_no = oi.order_no and ota.opr_type = '1' GROUP BY ot.order_no) startAddress, ( SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(concat(ifnull(da.city_name,''), da.address)) FROM delivery_address da LEFT JOIN order_take_adr ota on da.id = ota.delivery_id LEFT JOIN order_transport ot on ota.order_no = ot.order_no where ot.main_order_no = oi.order_no and ota.opr_type = '2' GROUP BY ot.order_no) endAddress, (select concat(vi.plate_number,' ',vi.hk_number) from order_send_cars osc left join order_transport ot on osc.order_no = ot.order_no left join vehicle_info vi on vi.id = osc.vehicle_id where ot.main_order_no = oi.order_no) licensePlate, (select ot.vehicle_size from order_transport ot where ot.main_order_no = oi.order_no) vehicleSize, (select sum(ota.piece_amount) from order_take_adr ota left join order_transport ot on ota.order_no = ot.order_no where ot.main_order_no = oi.order_no and ota.opr_type = '1') pieceNum, (select sum(ota.weight) from order_take_adr ota left join order_transport ot on ota.order_no = ot.order_no where ot.main_order_no = oi.order_no and ota.opr_type = '1') weight, (select GROUP_CONCAT(ota.goods_desc) from order_take_adr ota left join order_transport ot on ota.order_no = ot.order_no where ot.main_order_no = oi.order_no and ota.opr_type = '1' group by ota.order_no) goodsDesc, (select oc.yun_customs_no from order_customs oc where oc.main_order_no = oi.order_no limit 1) yunCustomsNo, orbd.settlement_currency settlementCurrencyCode, (select currency_name from currency_info ci where ci.currency_code=orbd.settlement_currency) settlementCurrency FROM order_info oi left join order_receivable_bill_detail orbd on orbd.order_no = oi.order_no left join order_receivable_bill orb on orb.id = orbd.bill_id where orbd.bill_no = #{billNo} group by oi.order_no,subOrderNo

SELECT DISTINCT orb.legal_name legalName, orb.legal_entity_id legalEntityId, orbd.account_term accountTermStr, orb.unit_account customerName, orbd.bill_no billNo, orbd.make_user makeUser, orbd.make_time makeTimeStr FROM order_receivable_bill orb LEFT JOIN order_receivable_bill_detail orbd ON orb.id = orbd.bill_id WHERE orbd.bill_no = #{billNo} order by orbd.make_time desc limit 1

select temp.customerName,temp.costGenreName,temp.costName,temp.unitPrice,temp.number,temp.currencyName,temp.amount,temp.exchangeRate, changeAmount,temp.remarks from ( SELECT orc.customer_name customerName, (select cg.`name` from cost_genre cg where cg.id = orc.cost_genre_id) costGenreName, (select ci.`name` from cost_info ci where ci.id_code = orc.cost_code) costName, orc.unit_price unitPrice, orc.number, (select ci.currency_name from currency_info ci where ci.currency_code = orc.currency_code) currencyName, orc.amount, -- (select cr.exchange_rate from currency_rate cr where cr.dcid = (select ci.id from currency_info ci where ci.currency_code = 'CNY') and cr.ocid = (select ci.id from currency_info ci where ci.currency_code = orc.currency_code) and cr.`month` = orbd.account_term) exchangeRate, orbct.local_money_rate exchangeRate, orbct.local_money changeAmount, orc.remarks FROM order_receivable_cost orc LEFT JOIN order_receivable_bill_detail orbd ON orc.id = orbd.cost_id LEFT JOIN order_bill_cost_total orbct ON orbct.bill_no = orbd.bill_no and orbct.cost_id=orbd.cost_id LEFT JOIN cost_type ct ON ct.id = orc.cost_type_id WHERE orbd.bill_no = #{billNo} and ct.is_pay_collection = 0 ) temp

SELECT orb.unit_account customerName, orb.legal_name settleOrgName, orbd.settlement_currency currency, d.`name` saleDeptName, orbd.order_no businessNo, orbd.bill_no billNo, orbd.account_term businessDate, orbct.exchange_rate FROM order_receivable_cost orc left join order_info oi on oi.order_no = orc.main_order_no left join order_receivable_bill_detail orbd on orbd.cost_id = orc.id left join order_receivable_bill orb on orb.id = orbd.bill_id left join order_bill_cost_total orbct on orbct.bill_no = orbd.bill_no and orbct.cost_id = orbd.cost_id and money_type='2' left join department d on d.id = oi.biz_belong_depart left join customer_info ci on ci.id_code = orc.customer_code where orbd.bill_no = #{billNo} group by orbd.bill_no,orbd.order_no

SELECT ( SELECT ci.NAME FROM cost_info ci WHERE ci.id_code = orc.cost_code ) expenseName, ( SELECT code_name FROM cost_type ct WHERE ct.id = orc.cost_type_id ) expenseCategoryName, ( SELECT cg.NAME FROM cost_genre cg WHERE cg.id = orc.cost_genre_id ) expenseTypeName, orc.number, ifnull(orc.number,0) priceQty, ifnull(obct.money,0) taxPrice, ifnull(orbd.tax_rate,0) taxRate, orbd.order_no businessNo, orc.unit costUnit FROM order_receivable_bill_detail orbd left join order_bill_cost_total obct on obct.cost_id = orbd.cost_id and obct.bill_no=orbd.bill_no LEFT JOIN order_receivable_cost orc ON orbd.cost_id = orc.id WHERE orbd.bill_no = #{billNo} and orbd.order_no = #{orderNo}

SELECT DISTINCT (select ifnull(sum(obct.money),0) from order_bill_cost_total obct where obct.bill_no = orbd.bill_no and obct.cost_id in (SELECT orc.id FROM order_receivable_cost orc ,cost_type ct WHERE orc.cost_type_id = ct.id and is_pay_collection=0)) ysAmount, (select ci.currency_name from currency_info ci where ci.currency_code = orbd.settlement_currency limit 1) ysCurrency, ifnull((select sum(obct.money) from order_bill_cost_total obct where obct.bill_no = orbd.bill_no and obct.cost_id in (SELECT orc.id FROM order_receivable_cost orc , cost_type ct WHERE orc.cost_type_id = ct.id and is_pay_collection=0) ),0)-ifnull((select sum(cav.discount_money) from cancel_after_verification cav where cav.bill_no = orbd.bill_no ),0) wsAmount, (select ci.currency_name from currency_info ci where ci.currency_code = orbd.settlement_currency limit 1) wsCurrency FROM order_receivable_bill_detail orbd LEFT JOIN order_receivable_cost orc ON orbd.cost_id = orc.id WHERE orbd.bill_no = #{billNo} order by ysAmount desc limit 1

SELECT orbd.* FROM order_receivable_bill_detail orbd LEFT JOIN order_receivable_bill orb ON orbd.bill_id = orb.id WHERE orbd.order_no = #{orderNo} and orb.sub_type = #{subType} and orb.legal_name = #{legalName} and orb.unit_account = #{unitAccount}

SELECT orbd.* FROM order_receivable_bill_detail orbd LEFT JOIN order_receivable_bill orb ON orbd.bill_id = orb.id WHERE orbd.order_no = #{orderNo} and orb.sub_type = #{subType} and orb.legal_entity_id = #{legalId} and orb.unit_code = #{unitCode}
